channel.title: Unstructured Grid RSS Feed
channel.description: A news feed powered by Grails

item.title: Tampa Bay, FL Grid
item.content:encoded: This grid was developed for hydrodynamic simulations in Tampa Bay. Hindcast simulations were tested, and the model was being evaluated for possible nowcast/forecast simulations with the FVCOM model.
item.dc:creator: NOAA / NGDC

item.title: Florida-Southeast, SC/FL/GA Grid
item.content:encoded: This grid was used to simulate tides, the results of which were used in computing tidal datum fields for input to NOAA's VDatum tool.
item.dc:creator: NOAA / NGDC

item.dc:creator: NOAA / NGDC

item.title: Pensacola, LA/FL/MS/AL Grid

item.dc:creator: NOAA / NGDC

item.title: Pensacola Surge, Grid
item.content:encoded: The model evaluated coastal, estuarine, and inland flooding effects for a comprehensive representation of potential storm surge impacts. Best available topography and bathymetry data was incorporated into the model to account for any recent changes within these coastal areas (e.g., due to the effects of earlier storms such as Ivan in 2004). The model was tested in the demonstration area of Pensacola, Florida.
item.dc:creator: NOAA / NGDC

item.title: Southern Louisiana, LA Grid
item.content:encoded: Integrated bathymetric-topographic unstructured DEM of southern Louisiana.
item.dc:creator: NOAA / NGDC
